Docs.summary: Defines the property and event a control implements to act as a check box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ICheckBoxControl interface defines the property and event that must be implemented for a control to act as a check box on a Web page. The <xref:System.Web.UI.ICheckBoxControl.Checked%2A> property can be used to determine whether the check box is selected or to set the property programmatically. The <xref:System.Web.UI.ICheckBoxControl.CheckedChanged> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICheckBoxControl.Checked%2A> value changes between posts to the server.
